attributes.action: propose a law for the physical and public chastisement of public officials
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The signatories would like to see corruption and incompetence in public office punished with public corporal punishment and chastisement (flogging and pillorying). The purpose of such punishment would be to encourage responsibility and answerability and to provide just satisfaction in the absence thereof. This law would apply to all public officials, from Cabinet to Village Council.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
